text: Sace kho pana karoto karīyati pāpaṃ na kho panāhaṃ kassaci pāpaṃ cetemi akarontaṃ kho pana maṃ pāpakammaṃ kuto dukkhaṃ phusissatī ti ayamassa tatiyo assāso adhigato hoti
edit: Sace kho pana karoto karīyati pāpaṃ na kho panāhaṃ – kassaci pāpaṃ cetemi akarontaṃ kho pana maṃ pāpakammaṃ kuto dukkhaṃ phusissatī ti ayamassa tatiyo assāso adhigato hoti

translations.transtext: (3) If when [a person] is doing [an evil action], the evil action is done, [and] I do not intend the evil action for anybody, how will suffering reach me who do no [such an action]? This is the third obtained consolation.
